abstract: School Book column on interview with Allison Keil and Ara Stone, teachers who founded the Community Roots Charter School in Fort Greene, Brooklyn.
snippet: Allison Keil and Sara Stone, young and idealistic teachers, founded the Community Roots Charter School in Fort Greene, Brooklyn, six years ago.
lead_paragraph: Allison Keil and Sara Stone, young and idealistic teachers, founded the Community Roots Charter School in Fort Greene, Brooklyn, six years ago.

headline.main: In Brooklyn Charter School, a Focus on Co-Teaching and Inclusion
headline.print_headline: In Brooklyn Charter School, a Focus on Co-Teaching and Inclusion
headline.kicker: Principal’s Office: Allison Keil and Sara Stone
